text: Ed Badger (born November 5, 1932) is a former American college and professional basketball coach. He was born in West New York, New Jersey and was raised in Chicago. He coached the Chicago Bulls between 1976 until 1978. He also coached the Cincinnati Bearcats between 1978 until 1983."Badger, Aide Under Motta, Is Named Coach of Bulls," The Associated Press (AP), Wednesday, August 25, 1976. title: Ed Badger
